desgination: MALALA FUND CO-FOUNDER, U.S. BOARD CHAIR AND U.K. TRUSTEE
name: Malala Yousafzai
description: Malala Yousafzai is a Pakistani activist, student, UN Messenger of Peace and the youngest person ever awarded the Nobel Peace Prize. As co-founder, she is building a world where every girl can learn and lead without fear.

name: Akhter Mateen
description: Akhter is a former Chief Auditor of Unilever where he held many other high-level roles in Pakistan, the U.K., Latin America, South East Asia and elsewhere. He is Deputy Chairman and Audit Committee Chair of Great Ormond Street Hospital’s Trust, Non-Executive Director of CABI and on the Board of DIL Trust U.K. and King’s College Hospital NHS Foundation Trust as a Non-Executive Director.

name: Alaa Murabit
description: Alaa Murabit is an award-winning medical doctor, global security strategist, women’s rights advocate, Harvard Radcliffe Institute Fellow (2020-2021) and United Nations High-Level Commissioner on Health, Employment & Economic Growth and Sustainable Development Goal Global Advocate. At the age of 21, she founded and spearheaded The Voice of Libyan Women. She is currently PAC Director at the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.
